item.title: European PM Job Search: GetYourGuide Interview Retrospective
item.author: contact@yfreetime.com (Danny Yuan)
item.description: Today I’m reviewing my experience finding a product manager job in Europe. Europe’s strengths lie in fundamental sciences and traditional industries, which created a certain dependence on industry. The current internet landscape in Europe feels more like China ten years ago—going through “Internet+” digitalization and mobile transformation. But because of fragmented markets and regulatory constraints, it’s hard for monopoly‑style giants to emerge. This matches my impression of European companies: small, beautiful, focused.

item.title: The “Retail Leek” Psychology in Futures Trading
item.author: contact@yfreetime.com (Danny Yuan)
item.description: At first I thought futures trading was just a toy for a small group of high‑risk crypto players, while spot was the “mainstream.” After getting involved, I realized I was wrong. In crypto, spot volume is far smaller than futures—futures are the real main force (though most people still trade spot). This “fast lane” lets you feel market turbulence every second. You don’t need to own the asset; you just predict price movements and speculate on the spread. I learned the hard way that in this market, the strongest capital often decides the direction.

item.title: Building a Personal Website: Finding Your Digital Space in a Social Media‑Driven World
item.author: contact@yfreetime.com (Danny Yuan)
item.description: In an era dominated by the instantaneous gratification of social media, the notion of creating a personal website might seem, at first glance, like a quaint relic from a bygone digital epoch. Yet, as we wade through the ephemeral streams of TikToks, Tweets, and status updates, the allure of a dedicated digital space—a personal website—becomes increasingly compelling. This blog post explores the why, how, and what of building a personal website amid the clamor of social media, with a lens on the Chinese digital landscape and a global perspective.
